TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public MustInherit Class ToolZone Inherits WebZone Implements IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class ToolZone abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebZone, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler
type ToolZone = class inherit WebZone interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 作為一組協助程式區域的基底類別，這些區域只以特定相關聯網頁顯示模式顯示。

span.span: Serves as the base class for a set of helper zones that appear only in certain associated page display modes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 組件控制項集合中，區域是區域，以在網頁上包含伺服器控制項，並提供一致的使用者介面 (UI) 中的模組化的版面配置，來包含的控制項。In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a region on a Web page that contains server controls, and provides modular layout with a consistent user interface (UI) for the contained controls. 有兩種一般的區域控制項衍生自基底類別：區域和區域。There are two general types of zone controls that derive from the base class: zones and zones. 區域包含伺服器控制項 (它可以是自訂控制項或其他伺服器控制項，包括 ASP.NET 控制項和使用者控制項)。The zones contain server controls (which can be custom controls, or other server controls including ASP.NET controls and user controls). 這些控制項形成主網頁的 UI，並中會顯示所有可能的顯示模式，除非以程式設計方式或由使用者會隱藏起來。These controls form the primary UI of a Web page and are visible in all the possible display modes, unless they are hidden programmatically or by a user. 區域會顯示只有頁面是在特定區域中，相關聯的顯示模式，而且這些區域也包含特殊的伺服器控制項，可讓使用者修改版面配置、 外觀、 屬性和內容的特殊的協助程式區域將頁面從 web 瀏覽器中。The zones are special helper zones that appear only when a page is in certain display modes associated with the zone, and these zones also contain special server controls that enable users to modify the layout, appearance, properties, and content of Web pages from within a browser. 開發人員可以繼承自基底類別，或任何衍生區域，建立自訂的區域。Developers can inherit from the base class, or any of the derived zones, to create custom zones. Web 組件控制集包含三種類型的區域，如下表所示。The Web Parts control set contains three types of zones, described in the following table. |工具區域類型Tool zone type|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||包含用來編輯的控制項和在頁面上的伺服器控制項屬性。Contains controls used to edit and server control properties on a page.| ||包含控制項，其中又包含使用者可以加入至網頁的控制項。Contains controls, which in turn contain controls that users can add to a page.| ||不包含宣告的標記項目;此區域是獨立的。Does not contain declarative markup elements; this zone is self-contained. 在執行階段，它會呈現特殊的 UI，讓使用者可以管理之間的連線控制項。At run time, it renders a special UI that enables users to manage connections between controls.| 基底類別提供方法和屬性，適合用來衍生區域。The base class provides methods and properties that are useful to derived zones. 它包含並方法，覆寫基底方法，從類別，並呈現按鈕和其他 UI 屬性的頁首和頁尾的區域。It contains and methods, which override the base methods from the class, and render buttons and other UI attributes for the header and footer of a zone. 另外還有數個成員來處理使用者可以執行各種不同的區域中的通用 UI 動作的動詞。There are also several members for handling verbs, which are common UI actions that users can perform in the various zones. 與處理動詞命令相關的成員包括： ， ，和。Members related to handling verbs include: , , and . 包含兩個多載的方法，加入物件到集合。The contains two overloaded methods, which add objects to the collection. 此集合相關聯的顯示模式可讓您判斷特定類型的區域相關的顯示模式 （亦即，它會判斷哪一個顯示模式區域的可見）。This collection of associated display modes determines which display modes are related to a particular type of zone (in other words, it determines in which display modes a zone is visible). 聯集所有相關聯的所有顯示模式給定的 Web 網頁上的區域可讓您決定 （除了一般的瀏覽模式） 的顯示模式是否可能支援在頁面上。The union of all associated display modes for all the zones on a given Web page determines which display modes (besides the normal browse mode) are possible or supported on the page. 支援的網頁顯示模式集合包含在屬性。The collection of supported display modes for a page is contained in the property. > [!NOTE] > 在任何時候，只能有一個顯示模式可以是在頁面上作用。At any given time, only one display mode can be active on a page. 在中參考的目前作用中的顯示模式屬性。The currently active display mode is referenced in the property. 類別也包含一些包含區域的各個不同的 UI 元素的樣式屬性的樣式屬性。The class also contains a number of style properties that contain style attributes for the various UI elements of a zone. 有些樣式屬性包括， ， ，和。Some style properties include , , , and .

para.span: Web 組件控制集包含在 < 備註 > 一節中，上面所列的特殊的區域，您通常可以衍生自其中一個自訂行為新增至區域。

span.span: The Web Parts control set contains the specialized zones listed above in the Remarks section, and you can often derive from one of them to add custom behavior to a zone.

para.span: 不過，呈現區域的多個以程式設計方式控制，您應該直接繼承自類別。

span.span: However, for more programmatic control over the rendering of a zone, you should inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 例如，您可能要建立自訂的區域，以進行特殊化工作，例如搜尋區域。

span.span: For example, you might want to create a custom zone for a specialized task, such as a search zone.

para.span: 若要建立自訂的區域，您可以覆寫任何虛擬完全來自訂轉譯，或您的成員可以覆寫特定成員。

span.span: To create a custom zone, you can override any of the virtual members to fully customize the rendering, or you can override only a specific member.

para.span: （選擇性） 您也可以建立自訂的顯示模式為您的區域藉由繼承自類別，但這並非必要。

span.span: Optionally, you can also create a custom display mode for your zone by inheriting from the class, but this is not required.

para.span: 在您區域的建構函式，您應該加入您想要設定您要顯示的區域，在不同的顯示模式物件，使您的區域會顯示這些頁面時顯示模式。

span.span: In the constructor of your zone, you should add the various display modes in which you want your zone to be displayed to a object, so that your zone is visible when the page is in those display modes.
Introduction to Web Parts

related.span: 概觀： Web 組件控制項集合

span.span: Overview: The Web Parts Control Set

related.span: 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 將一個或多個 物件與特定區域類型 相關聯，當網頁處於適當網頁顯示模式時，可以顯示該區域。

span.span: Associates one or more objects with a particular type of zone, enabling that zone to be displayed when a page is in the appropriate page display mode.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection associatedDisplayModes) cil managed

param.name: associatedDisplayModes
param.span: 物件的 ，該物件會判斷何時可以顯示區域。

span.span: An of objects that determine when a zone can be displayed.

summary.span: 將 物件的集合與特定 區域相關聯，以便該區域可以顯示於適當網頁顯示模式。

span.span: Associates a collection of objects with a particular zone, so that the zone can be displayed in the appropriate page display modes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式來建立與一或多個顯示模式的區域。The constructor is used to associate a zone with one or more display modes. 這可讓工具區域會顯示在相關聯的顯示模式。This enables the tool zone to be displayed in the associated display modes. > [!NOTE] > 在實作區域 Web 組件控制集所提供，每個區域是只有一個顯示模式與相關聯。In the implementation of zones provided by the Web Parts control set, each zone is associated with only one display mode. 不過，使用這個多載的建構函式，就可以關聯多個顯示模式中的自訂區域。However, using this overload of the constructor, it is possible to associate a custom zone with multiple display modes.

span.span: The parameter is equal to or 0.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode associatedDisplayMode) cil managed

span.span: A that determines when a zone can be displayed.

summary.span: 將單一 物件與特定 區域相關聯，以便該區域可以顯示於適當網頁顯示模式。

span.span: Associates a single object with a particular zone, so that the zone can be displayed in the appropriate page display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式來建立含單一顯示畫面 」 模式的區域。The constructor is used to associate a zone with a single display mode. 這可讓網頁進入該顯示模式時要顯示的工具區域。This enables the tool zone to be displayed when a page enters that display mode. 例如，只有在顯示控制項模式。For example, a control can be displayed only in mode.

span.span: The parameter is equal to .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssociatedDisplayModes As WebPartDisplayModeCollection

summary.span: 取得與特定 區域相關聯的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects that are associated with a particular zone.

value.span: ，包含與 控制項相關聯的 物件。

span.span: A that contains objects associated with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個控制項有一種特殊的頁面顯示模式，與其相關聯下, 表所示。Each control has a special page display mode associated with it, as indicated in the following table. > [!NOTE] > 在實作區域 Web 組件控制集所提供，每個區域是只有一個顯示模式與相關聯。In the implementation of zones provided by the Web Parts control set, each zone is associated with only one display mode. 不過，使用您無法關聯多個顯示模式中的自訂區域。However, using the you could associate a custom zone with multiple display modes. |工具區域類型Tool zone type|相關聯的顯示模式Associated display mode| |--------------------|-----------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 在頁面上的每個區域的相關聯的顯示模式的集合加入至屬性，決定整組可能的頁面上的顯示模式。The collection of associated display modes for each zone on a page is added to the property, which determines the total set of possible display modes on a page.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 提供基底方法宣告，衍生的 控制項可覆寫此基底方法宣告，以處理關閉特定區域的細節。

span.span: Provides a base method declaration that derived controls can override to handle the details of closing a specialized zone.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，其中該值指出目前是否顯示 控制項。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control is currently displayed.

value.span: 如果目前顯示 ，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the is currently displayed; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項中，根據預設，不會顯示 Web 組件頁面載入時。 controls, by default, are not displayed when a Web Parts page loads. 只有當頁面切換以程式設計方式或由使用者將具有特定相關聯的頁面顯示模式出現控制項。They appear only when the page is switched programmatically or by a user into a page display mode that is associated with a particular control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditUIStyle As Style
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ EditUIStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 控制項包含之控制項的樣式屬性。

span.span: Gets the style attributes for the editable controls contained in a control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項中可編輯控制項的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for editable controls within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您存取內含的可編輯控制項的樣式特性控制項。The property enables you to access style characteristics for the editable controls contained within a control. 可編輯的控制項所呈現的衍生區域，並包含下列控制項， ，和控制項，可讓使用者編輯屬性值上控制項。Editable controls are rendered by the derived zones, and include controls such as , , and controls that enable users to edit property values on controls. 中所包含的樣式特性屬性套用至可編輯的控制項一起撰寫編輯使用者介面 (UI) 顯示給使用者。The style characteristics contained in the property apply to the editable controls, which together compose the editing user interface (UI) that appears to users. > [!NOTE] > 即使屬性是唯讀的您可以設定基礎的樣式屬性物件。Even though the property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用繼承的屬性控制項。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 具體來說，它會示範如何變更屬性中的 UI 項目控制項。Specifically, it demonstrates how to change the property for UI elements in an control. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，在頁面中，參考可讓您的網頁切換至不同的顯示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 如需有關顯示模式，以便在它們之間切換可讓使用者的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 此頁面包含控制項，繼承自類別。The page contains an control, which inherits from the class. `Button1_Click`方法中的頁面集屬性。The `Button1_Click` method in the page sets the property. 請注意，在頁面載入之後，您必須切換頁面進入編輯模式，若要查看的效果屬性上的控制項的 UI。Note that after the page loads, you must switch the page into edit mode to see the effects of the property on the control's UI. 當您按一下按鈕，叫做**變更編輯 UI 字型**，請注意，在區域中的可編輯控制項的字型變更。As you click the button that says **Change Edit UI Font**, notice that the font of the editable controls in the zone changes. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/CS/toolzone_edituistylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_EditUIStyle/VB/toolzone_edituistylevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property HeaderCloseVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 取得 控制項頁首中 物件的參考，該物件用於關閉控制項。

span.span: Gets a reference to the object in the header of a control that is used to close the control.
The used to close a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性以程式設計方式或在 Web 的宣告式標記頁面，即可指定用來關閉動詞命令的各種屬性控制項。You can use the property programmatically or in the declarative markup of a Web page to specify various attributes for the verb that is used to close a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用繼承的屬性控制項。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 此範例示範如何啟用和停用的標頭中的關閉動詞命令控制項。The example shows how to enable and disable the close verb in the header of an control. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，在頁面中，參考可讓您的網頁切換至不同的顯示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 如需有關顯示模式，以便在它們之間切換可讓使用者的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 此頁面包含控制項，繼承自類別。The page contains an control, which inherits from the class. `Button1_Click`方法中的頁面集屬性值。The `Button1_Click` method in the page sets the property value. 請注意，在頁面載入之後，您必須切換頁面進入編輯模式，以查看使用的程式碼的影響屬性上的控制項。Note that after the page loads, you must switch the page into edit mode to see the effects of the code that uses the property on the control. 當您按一下**啟用/停用的關閉動詞命令**按鈕時，該區域的標頭中的動詞命令應或者啟用和停用。As you click the **Enable/Disable Close Verb** button, the verb in the header of the zone should be alternately enabled and disabled. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/CS/toolzone_headercloseverbcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderCloseVerb/VB/toolzone_headercloseverbvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ HeaderVerbStyle { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得顯示於 控制項中所有頁首動詞命令的樣式屬性。

span.span: Gets the style attributes for all header verbs displayed in a control.

value.span: ，包含 中頁首動詞命令的樣式屬性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for header verbs within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，但它是唯讀的可讓您取得或設定基礎的樣式屬性物件中的所有標頭動詞命令控制項。The property, though it is read-only, enables you to get or set the style attributes of the underlying object for all the header verbs in a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用繼承的屬性控制項。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 此範例示範如何變更周圍的框線寬度藉由使用這個屬性的控制項。The example shows how to change the width of the border around an control by using this property. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，在頁面中，參考可讓您的網頁切換至不同的顯示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 如需有關顯示模式，以便在它們之間切換可讓使用者的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 此頁面包含控制項，繼承自類別。The page contains an control, which inherits from the class. `Button1_Click`方法中的頁面集屬性值。The `Button1_Click` method in the page sets the property value. 請注意，在頁面載入之後，您必須切換頁面進入編輯模式，以查看使用的程式碼的影響屬性上的控制項。Note that after the page loads, you must switch the page into edit mode to see the effects of the code that uses the property on the control. 當您按一下**切換標頭動詞框線** 按鈕，區域周圍的框線寬度應該變更。As you click the **Toggle Header Verb Border** button, the border width around the zone should change. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/CS/toolzone_headerverbstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_HeaderVerbStyle/VB/toolzone_headerverbstylevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string InstructionText { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property InstructionText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ InstructionText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.InstructionText : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中的文字，該文字提供使用者方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the text in a control that provides directions for end users.

value.span: 字串，包含使用者的指示。

span.span: A string that contains the directions for end users.

value.span: 適用於特定工具區域的預設值，由衍生的 類別提供。

span.span: A default value appropriate to specific tool zones is provided by derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來保存一組針對某一特定的使用者所提供的指示顯示控制項。The property is used to hold a set of instructions that are provided for end users when a particular control is displayed. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用繼承的屬性控制項。The following code example shows how to use the property with an inherited control. 此範例示範如何變更的值會出現在指示文字的藉由使用這個屬性的控制項。The example shows how to change the value of the instruction text that appears in an control by using this property. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，在頁面中，參考可讓您的網頁切換至不同的顯示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that is referenced in the page, and enables you to switch the page to different display modes. 如需有關顯示模式，以便在它們之間切換可讓使用者的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分示範部分類別，其中包含程式碼來更新屬性以程式設計方式在`Button1_Click`方法。The second part of the code example shows a partial class that contains the code to update the property programmatically in the `Button1_Click` method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/CS/Toolzone_overview.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/VB/Toolzone_overview.vb#2)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分示範包含兩個繼承的網頁控制項：控制項和控制項。The third part of the code example shows a Web page that contains two inherited controls: a control and an control. 每個控制項中頁面的宣告式標記會設定一些屬性。Each control sets some properties in the declarative markup of the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/CS/Toolzone_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ToolZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ToolZone_Overview/VB/Toolzone_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 您可以載入瀏覽器，並在不同的網頁顯示模式，以查看不同的工具區域的行為方式的參數中的頁面。You can load the page in a browser and switch among the various page display modes to see how the different tool zones behave. 切換到編輯模式的頁面，在文字方塊中，輸入一些文字，按一下**更新區域文字編輯**若要查看的程式設計方式更新效果屬性。Switch the page into edit mode, enter some text into the text box, and click **Update Edit Zone Text** to see the effect of programmatically updating the property. 指示文字會顯示區域的頂端附近。The instruction text appears near the top of the zone.

para.span: Web 組件中的工具區域控制項衍生自的集合類別 (請參閱中列出的區域類別概觀) 覆寫提供終端使用者的預設值指示的屬性。

span.span: Tool zones in the Web Parts control set that derive from the class (see the zones listed in the class overview) override the property to provide default instructions for end users.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

span.span: Calls the method for a control when the control posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用者按一下的關閉動詞命令控制項，當頁面值傳遞給`eventArgument`參數來方法，然後呼叫控制項方法。If a user clicks a close verb in a control, when the page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the method, the control then calls the method.

span.span: Overrides the base method to provide specialized rendering for the header area required by controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呈現所有詳細資料的標頭控制項，包括樣式屬性，包含標頭、 實際的內容，並關閉動詞命令的資料表。The method renders all the details for the header of a control, including style attributes, the table that contains the header, the actual contents, and a close verb.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呈現特定的使用者介面區域中的物件。The method renders the user interface for a specific object in a zone. 這個方法會檢查值屬性，然後，根據該值呈現動詞命令為按鈕、 連結或可點選的影像。The method checks the value of the property and, based on that value, renders the verb as a button, a link, or a clickable image.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出伺服器控制項是否要呈現為網頁上的使用者介面 (UI) 項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a server control is rendered as a user interface (UI) element on the page.

value.span: 如果控制項在網頁上可見，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control is visible on the page; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會覆寫基底考慮兩個基底屬性的值和值的屬性屬性。The class overrides the base property to consider both the value of the base property and the value of the property. 如果這兩個屬性值都會設為`true`，則屬性傳回的值`true`，而且控制項是在網頁上可見。If both property values are set to `true`, then the property returns a value of `true`, and the control is visible on the page. 如果其中一個屬性值是`false`，則屬性傳回的值`false`，和看不到控制項。If either property value is `false`, the property returns a value of `false`, and the control is not visible. > [!IMPORTANT] > 屬性只可以在設計工具，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 設計工具中的設計階段指派。The property can only be assigned at design time in a designer, such as the Microsoft Visual Studio designer. 如果您嘗試以程式設計方式設定屬性，則會擲回例外狀況。If you attempt to set the property programmatically, an exception is thrown. 此屬性不是可繫結在視覺化設計工具，但可在執行階段繫結。This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

exception.span: 呼叫端嘗試在執行階段設定屬性。

span.span: The caller attempts to set the property at run time.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
